item.title: The music industry is broken. OpenWav’s new app aims to change that
item.description: OpenWav is building a direct-to-fan platform for music artists which lets them keep more of the profits.

item.title: Tesla’s robotaxi plans for Nevada move forward with testing permit
item.description: Tesla can now test its autonomous vehicle technology on public streets in Nevada, but it still has steps to take if it wants to offer paid rides like ...

item.title: Elon Musk’s Boring Company suspends work on Vegas airport tunnel after ‘crushing injury’
item.description: A worker had to be rescued by the local fire department, but is reportedly stable. Dozens of Boring Company workers have been injured over the years i...

item.title: Justice Department sues Uber for allegedly discriminating against people with disabilities
item.description: It's the latest in a long line of criticism — and action — against the company's treatment of people with physical disabilities.

item.title: VC leaders from 01 Advisors take the Builders Stage at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 to share the scaling playbook
item.description: Adam Bain, Dick Costolo, and David Fischer — the operators behind Twitter and Meta’s growth — reunite at Disrupt 2025.
